title: Expanding the Expression
text: The first step is to expand the expression. $$1^7=1\times1\times1\times1\times1\times1$$.
speech: The first step is to expand the expression.  1 to the seventh is equal to 1 times 1 times 1 times 1 times 1 times 1 .
pacedSpeech: The first step is to expand the expression.   1 to the seventh is equal to 1 times 1 times 1 times 1 times 1 times 1

title: Product of $$1\times1$$
speech: The product of , 1 times 1  is always  1, .

title: Answer
text: Since the product of $$1\times1$$ is always $$1$$, we can tell that $$1^7=1$$. This is because no matter how many times we multiply $$1$$ by itself, it will always be $$1$$.
